trans-unit.source: Represents a selectable item in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox" /> 內的可選取項目。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>包含的集合<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>物件。

trans-unit.source: To select a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，將<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Bind a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> to data by binding the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to a data source.
trans-unit.target: 繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>資料繫結<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemsSource%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>到資料來源。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Bind a ListBox to Data](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-bind-a-listbox-to-data.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將 ListBox 資料繫結](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-bind-a-listbox-to-data.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> to a <xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>.
trans-unit.target: 您可以自訂的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>藉由設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>至<xref:System.Windows.DataTemplate>。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>設<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>。

trans-unit.source: The default horizontal position of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> is <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>.
trans-unit.target: 預設的水平位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>是<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Center>。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> through a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>, the panel's default is applied and the item is centered.
trans-unit.target: 如果您設定<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>透過<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>、 已套用面板的預設和項目會置中。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，這表示它可以包含單一物件的任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板）。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Customizing the ListBoxItem Control
trans-unit.target: 自訂 ListBoxItem 控制項

trans-unit.source: To apply the same property settings to multiple <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項，可使用<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: 您可以修改預設<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>, see [ListBox Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/listbox-styles-and-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>，請參閱[清單方塊樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/listbox-styles-and-templates.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> that contains <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> elements.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>包含<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，該值指出 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 是否已選取。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果選取項目，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To select a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要選取<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>，將此屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性資訊

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 識別項欄位

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set a list box item to be selected when the list box is created.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範如何設定要建立清單方塊選取清單方塊項目。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected" /> 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Provides an appropriate <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" /> implementation for this control, as part of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] automation infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 提供這個控制項適當的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ListBoxItemAutomationPeer" /> 實作，做為 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 自動化基礎結構的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The type-specific <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 因型別而異的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> 實作。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse enters a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠進入 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the mouse leaves a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 當滑鼠離開 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the user presses the right mouse button over the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 上按下滑鼠右鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the user presses the right mouse button over a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 上按下滑鼠右鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> is selected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 當在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 內選取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox" /> 時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A>屬性變更為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> is unselected in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox" />.
trans-unit.target: 當在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 內取消選取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox" /> 時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A> property changes to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法時，會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem.IsSelected%2A>屬性變更為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The previous <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent" /> 的上一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Called when the visual parent of a list box item changes.
trans-unit.target: 當清單方塊項目的視覺化父項目變更時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> is selected.
trans-unit.target: 發生在選取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ListBoxItem" /> 時。

trans-unit.source: To know when the selection in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> changes, listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要知道何時中的選取範圍<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>變更時，接聽<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: To know when the selection in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> changes, listen for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要知道何時中的選取範圍<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>變更時，接聽<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged>事件。
